column4: ok, so anyone know the answer, teamwork seems to have left, do I have to shut X down to purge/reinstall ubuntu-desktop ?
ppl take the time to write up a tutorial on how to do what you want
its upto you to decide to check out the links to see
no... any way reinstalling ubuntu-desktop will only draw eventually missing apps. what do you expect it to do?
this could be related to the nwly adopted ubuntu habit of mounting by UUID
is it best to troubleshoot from my own system, or put the HD back in, boot with a Live CD?
best bet would be to leave it as it is, boot the Desktop CD and evaluate the situation from there.
he didn't even ask a question....
